column1: Little Goat Diner////As a huge fan of Girl and the Goat
column2: Little Goat has been on my radar ever since it opened. It seemed like a more casual restaurant with a way broader menu that included breakfast stuff
column5: and also heavier dishes. Little Goat was a place I wouldn't really plan ahead for and make reservations in advance like you have to for GaTG
column6: which is probably why I haven't checked it out until now. Every time I would drop by to try to get a table there would be a huge wait
column7: and with all the other great options on Randolph
column8: it just never seemed worth it.
